titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the inhabitants of the county of Buckingham, presented to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie at VVindsor the thirteenth of this instant January. 1642. In the behalfe of Mr. Hampden Knight for the said county, and of the rest of the members of Parliament, accused by his Maiestie of treason. VVith his Maiesties gratious answere thereunto.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I).

notesStmt.note: The King's answer is dated: 13 January, 1642.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
